website_summaries.verdict: Nice price for basic conference phone with multiple microphones.
pros: Includes 1 built-in microphone and 2 wireless microphones
For use by several people at the same time
Wireless mics charge from the main base unit so they're always at hand
Conference phone with full-duplex design so everyone can speak and be heard simultaneously
cons: Audio quality through the microphones is not consistent

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Phone - Excellent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This attractive conference phone set up easily and worked flawlessly out of the box The only negative was that our test callers said that there was a slight echo, which I found to be more of a 'tinny' sound (treble over-modulation to improve voice comprehension.) Having said that, it was perfectly understandable. The wireless mics are wonderful, especially for long phone calls. Now, I can get up and pace during a call without effecting the call quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value; Not High End
customer_reviews.text: Good bang for your buck. Not the best conference phone I've used, but works well for my home office. Usually need to use one of the cordless mics placed within 12-18 inches in order to be heard easily, even when sitting only a few feet away from the base unit. But as long as you're close to a mic, works great. Excellent sound quality from the speaker. Would recommend for home office or light duty commercial applications where an analog speakerphone is needed.
customer_reviews.author: BoomerSo1r

customer_reviews.title: Everyone in the office likes this way more than the polycom
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if this would be as good as the polycom that we needed to replace. Everyone in the office likes this way more than the polycom. Great sound quality, no echo, and the CAT5 connection allows users to take it to their office and use it there. the CAT5 is not for networking it, but I can keep the base unit in the server room, and I used a CAT5 splitter (1 to 1) to allow users to use it in their office where there's a free network drop.
customer_reviews.author: Greener

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to the shelter in place and work from home situation. I have the speaker phone placed away from me and use the detachable mic. The detachable mic fits nicely in my hand and it's easy to hit mute and unmute during conference calls.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tong

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Addition to our business
customer_reviews.text: Our business order two of these devices for our conference/huddle rooms. Everyone in the office loves these devices. We ordered 2 more for our out of state office so that employees could make conference calls without using their cell phones. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacoby G

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been searching for a great speaker phone for years. The interface is very logical and easy to use. It is easy to store names, and easy to call people from the directory. The sound quality is great. People can hear me clearly and I can hear others loud and clear. The design is authentically pleasing, and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Mink

customer_reviews.title: Great Device at Half the Price
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure that this conference phone would be as good as the more expensive competitors model that is usually the standard in most offices, but I was happily surprised at its excellence and ease of use and setup. The power supply is where you plug in the phone wire and the wire from the power supply to the device carries both power and voice. It works as good as the more expensive competitors model.
customer_reviews.author: Rick in NY

customer_reviews.title: Vtech VCS702 is a terrific phone for conference calls and a steal at $149!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I'm thoroughly pleased with the quality of this product. My conference calls today were less painful, thanks to Vtech's terrific speaker. I was able to hear every speaker clearly! I asked my teammates how I sounded. They said I sounded loud and clear. The speaker phone looks terrific and has a quality feel to it. I work from home and I'll be using this for conference calls (4 to 5 hours a day). At $149, this was a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: CyberDad

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 6 of these units. I have had so many problems with PolyX$#@ that I have switched to Vtech on campus. I have had great reviews from departments that are using these and will continue to buy these instead of the other company. The price on these is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Well made, poor audio quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality construction, easy to use but the audio quality for people on the other end was remarkably bad. Every person complained that I sounded like I was in a tube or a barrel or an elevator.
customer_reviews.author: tux

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: My head is about 2 feet away and I hear every time that I’m hard to hear it’s right by my keyboard and mouse !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I installed it Myself!
customer_reviews.text: I have a home office. This has been wonderful for calls. No more static, missed and garbled conversations. Clear communications. Easy to install (I did it myself, which is a miracle in itself). Wish I had found this little gadget sooner.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Wife hooked right up with no issues. Sounded great when she used it to call me.
customer_reviews.author: Kg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, recommended.
customer_reviews.text: We have an 1100 square foot office, six people and it works perfectly in our environment. Plenty loud enough for us to remain at our desks, and the two wireless microphones make it possible for us to be heard loud and clear. And it's easy to set up and to use. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: K.T. Portland

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my significant other. He loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my significant other. He loves it. The sound quality is above par and he is very impressed with its range. He told me that he uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kimz

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product - voice quality speaking and listening is great, the removable microphones for people at greater distanced from the home unit work perfectly - also, it works with my Ooma VIOP system as well - 100% awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound.  Stiff buttons.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is really good. Buttons are stiff making it notably harder to dial than most phones.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It works really well. The microphones have a good range and you can hear cleary. I used it in a large room with a tile floor and 9 people and the person on the other end of the call heard us all very clearly. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Call is so clear!
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn't take much to impress us over the one we had, but this one arrived quickly and the call is so clear. This is the second VTech we have ordered, the other model has four microphones. Both work great. This model was really the cheapest of all offered in this category. I would recommend both.
customer_reviews.author: RKB

customer_reviews.title: The look and feel is great but is annoying that the wordings print on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel is great but is annoying that the wordings print on the button is too light so is quite hard to see what the button is for. The speaker is quite loud.
customer_reviews.author: limcheekian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Screen and buttons large and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Screen and buttons large and easy to read. Excellent voice clarity in and out. I like it better than the $1K VOIP that it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: This conference phone has been great for our weekly clinician conferences
customer_reviews.text: This conference phone has been great for our weekly clinician conferences. the mini microphones allow everyone in the room to speak and be heard to those in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a client that we frequently had phone conferences with in small groups. They were using a wireless handset on speaker and it was a tough communication device. With this, we have had three calls with clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tamie Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Executive experience, low tech and cost effective.
customer_reviews.text: My church needed a way to allow members not able to attend bible study remotely and this product made them still feel like they were in the room. The wireless mics are perfect to capture participants responses around the room with clarity. This a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: BeWeezy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for dial-in conference call in a large room (this is a single line phone). All of the people calling in could hear perfectly. The extra microphones were placed at each end of a long conference table. No one had to shout. Some of the attendees even took a picture of it so that they could purchase it for their company. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Mona McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.text: The unit was easy to set up, worked right away, and provided very good sound quality at both ends. For a non-high tech person, this was a very good purchase and will allow me to expand my business by offering conference call options to clients.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent intercom/conference phone
customer_reviews.text: easy set up instructions. did it in minutes. good product.
customer_reviews.author: Honiebee1973

customer_reviews.title: Great device and awesome support line for advice!
customer_reviews.text: Product is very easy to set up. Design is great. Speaker sound quality is pretty good. I had trouble at first with an echoey sound that turned out to be a digital telephone line. If considering make sure you have an anologue line to connect into.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Carbajal-Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound & easy to use - but you can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound & easy to use - but you can't conference people together - have to use an alternative conferencing method.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Home office
customer_reviews.text: I have this working with my Magic Jack. Clarity is great. Works like a charm in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: CMcGoogan

customer_reviews.title: Echo Quality
customer_reviews.text: This phone has an extremely bad echo background noise that makes it difficult for other call in users to hear you. Ended up returning this as we couldn't continue to use for our business.
customer_reviews.author: EP S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this to anyone who often has conference calls
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this to anyone who often has conference calls. The two mobile pods make it easy to effectively communicate if they’re sitting at a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Jrfield

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: We've only used the phone a few times in our company conference room but the sound quality was excellent and the caller could hear all members present no matter where they sat in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Wike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for all of the functionality. Would get this over a Polycom any day.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small company
customer_reviews.text: We're a small company of 4 employees, and this was a great graduation from the everyday speakerphone we were using before. Great sound quality, volume, and we love the detachable mics.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Hart

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great, no complaints from people on the other side ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great, no complaints from people on the other side of the line. The remotes with remote mute are awesome! Great overall product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tiffer

customer_reviews.title: The Vtech station works great! We use it everyday at work for our ...
customer_reviews.text: The Vtech station works great! We use it everyday at work for our morning telecons.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Howard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Business tool!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful speaker phone! Excellent for conference calls with sound clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great Conf Phone, Works Flawlessly With Ooma Office
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Phone is sturdier than expected, and love the design of the chargeable remote mics. Phone works flawlessly with our Ooma Office VOIP service.
customer_reviews.author: mrgolf

customer_reviews.title: this works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the occasional conference call, this works great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dude Man

customer_reviews.title: VTech VCS702 Eristation Conference phone
customer_reviews.text: wife uses it and she really likes it. sound is good and volume is loud enough
customer_reviews.author: LCL

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any conference room.
customer_reviews.text: We had a meeting using the unit and it worked great. Our conferees on the other end said the audio was super as it was on our side.
customer_reviews.author: Herschel D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. The system works really for us, clear calls/voices with no background noise picked up. The phone pods are great too. Easy system to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Sound is crystal clear and both wireless microphones work great across an entire banquet room. Highly recommend for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: AARON M CROSSON

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with VOIP
customer_reviews.text: We have a VOIP phone system and this did not work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Marna

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our board meetings where two or three people ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything it said it was m. Works great for our board meetings where two or three people call in to attend.
customer_reviews.author: Abmbob

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Care Improvement and Innovation Services

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works well for our small organizations office space. Those on calls heard us well and clearly.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like you're on an airplane - THE OUTSIDE
customer_reviews.text: I just received the phone, set it up just in time for a conference call. Within a minute the group asked me to switch back to my plantronics headset, call quality was terrible! So I tested it a few times leaving myself voicemails, no matter what outlet it was plugged into, or how close i was to the phone, it sounded as if i was on an airplane, and my voice cut in and out. Going to try the Polycom that others have recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Powell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: That device is indeed cost effective. International delivery was made on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker phone for the money for conference calls
customer_reviews.text: Met all of our expectations. Easy to install. Easy to use. Excellent sound quality. Quality construction. Excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: FaithMan2020

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the product. People are constantly telling me that they can't hear me, even though I was speaking directly into the remote speakers. Then just recently (6 months after buying) both of the remote speakers stopped charging and working making it essentially useless.
customer_reviews.author: becca bonwit

customer_reviews.title: looks great I have not opened the box yet so i ...
customer_reviews.text: looks great I have not opened the box yet so i can not say how it works
customer_reviews.author: calfrainbow

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is older analog technology and will not work with digital Cable phone service. Did no know this until after I purchased it and wasted a lot of time spent speaking with Vtech and Spectrum Cable phone service reps. Now it is too late to return to Amazon, so I’m out $200. The phone may work fine with analog phone service, but the nonprofit agency that I donated it to has digital phone service, so I’ll never know. I just wish this had been made clear in the product description before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: AppUnderdog

customer_reviews.title: Lots of echo, not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: It is an analog phone that doesn't work over IP. We have to get a special line to try and reduce the echo from the microphones.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Eberly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home office
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. I use this in my home office. Very crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: odin8117

customer_reviews.title: the seller was GREAT with return
customer_reviews.text: The item didn't work out for us, however, the seller was GREAT with return.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W

customer_reviews.title: Good price for good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this system. Helps me with group teleconferences in my small business
customer_reviews.author: SmartyPAnts

product_meta.title: VTech VCS702 ErisStation DECT 6.0 Conference Phone with Two Wireless Mics using Orbitlink Wireless Technology
product_meta.description: Conference phone with two wireless microphones features Orbitlink wireless technology to make your conference calls flexible and engaging. Integrated digital mixing technology delivers unified audio to give callers on the other end a seamless experience and the impression that everyone's speaking into the same microphone. Each wireless microphone provides up to 12 hours of talk time to keep your meetings going with just a single charge. And with up to 70 hours of standby time for each microphone, there's no need to worry about losing a charge mid-meeting. Magnetic charging bays in the base keep the microphones together and ready for your next call. Central, full-duplex speakerphone in the base allows callers to speak and be heard at the same time, just as they would in a face-to-face meeting. Conference phone also features a backlit display, multiple ringtones, mute indicator, dynamic noise reduction and more.
feature_bullets: Includes 2 DECT 6.0 Wireless microphones and 1 central fixed microphone.
2-line Backlit display with date and time saves up to 50 CID entries and 50 Name/number phonebook entries.
Central full-duplex speakerphone in base allows callers to speak and be heard at the same time, just as they would in a face-to-face meeting.
Magnetic Charging bays built into the base keep Wireless microphones keep the microphones together and ready for the next call.
Wireless microphones feature up to 70 hours of battery life with 8 hours of talk time.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars104 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
